_sText:
This is de_sand_blast_beta_3 a lot has changed including the layout changes - t spawn has a new location closer to bomb site a so it will be used more - there is a new walk way / hallway leading into / coming out of t spawn - ct's have a bit bigger, better and longer path out of their spawn - game play is more fair - some props have been changed, removed, and or added - i added buildings around bomb site A - bomb site A has been moved into one of the surrounding buildings - i have lowered bomb site A - added more buildings around the map - fixed areas where people could leave the map - fixed walls that were to thin
Watch more video games and play free games at WeGame.
map layout and build by Mastergun displacements made by wikedsick sky box texture made by karatekafer
